summary:
The add-on to the Bathing Beefcake Luxury Suite.
A simple makeover mod - changes the appearance of BBLS male NPC followers and gives them Apacii's hair.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3][b][color=#FF0000]BBLS versions 5.0 and 5.1 compatible[/color][/b][/size]

This mod is an add-on to the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]Bathing Beefcake Luxury Suite by Migal.[/url]

[size=+1][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]

- Skyrim 1.6.89 or higher
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]Bathing Beefcake Luxury Suite[/url] V. 3.6 or higher
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii Sky Hair[/url] Full main version 1.4 or higher.

[size=+1][b]Description:[/b][/size]

This mod is my own version of Bathing Beefcake guys, using Apachii Sky Hair.
Includes the makeovers for the following guys:
- Anders Lanaya (Breton, Combat Mage Elemental) ,
- Ray Lastius (Breton, Combat Ranger),
- Ramir Taussa (Redguard, Combat Scout),
- Truls Klarnik (Nord, Combat Assasin),
- Wyll Jarskarvir (Nord, Combat Rogue)
- Lane Cimsussim (Breton, combat sorcerer) - Lane wasn't changed that much, just a little "tweaked".

I haven't changed Farquar, Belwas and Ellis because I like them the way they are.
I haven't made any makeover for Soren and Eraamion, because these guys' faces are already made by me and included in the original BBLS since the version 3-6.

[size=+1][b]Installation:[/b][/size]

- download and install Bathing Beefcake Luxury Suite by Migal
- download and install my mod (use NMM and tell it to OVERWRITE the files).
- make sure my esp (BBLSGuysApachii.esp) goes AFTER all the BBLS esp files in the load order.
- make sure BBLSGuysApachii.esp is activated.

Note that if you are not using the original Suite's add-on for Apachii hair - the guys who were not changed by this mod (Farquar, Ellis, Soren, Eraamion, Belwas and additional girls) will still have Vanilla hair. If you want all the Suite NPCs to have Apachii hair you must first download and install the original Suite's add-on for Apachii hair (Under optional files on the BBLS page) and after that install my add-on, and OVERWRITE the files. Don't forget to put my esp (BBLSGuysApachii.esp) BELOW the BBLSapachii esp in the load order.

[size=+1][b]Update:[/b][/size]
For more detailed instructions on how to update read the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/292/]article on this page[/url].

[b][size=4][color=#7CFC00]R[/color][color=#83ED0E]e[/color][color=#8ADF1C]c[/color][color=#91D12B]o[/color][color=#99C239]m[/color][color=#A0B447]m[/color][color=#A7A656]e[/color][color=#AF9764]n[/color][color=#B68973]d[/color][color=#BD7B81]e[/color][color=#C56C8F]dÂ [/color][color=#D350AC]m[/color][color=#DB41BA]o[/color][color=#E233C9]d[/color][color=#E925D7]s[/color][/size][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18462]Music and Dancing in the Luxury Suite by Migal130[/url] - adds music and dancing to BB Luxury Suite
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19866]A Classier BB Luxury Suite by by RIP88[/url] - Beautiful retexture for the BB Luxury Suite and it has a Beefcake variant as well.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13050]No Naked Comments by Migal[/url] - keeps NPCs from commenting about your nakedness.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Extensible Follower Framework by Expired[/url] - If you are looking for a multi-follower mod I recommend using it. It has no known incompatibilities with BBLS.


[size=+1][b]The screen-shots were made using:[/b][/size]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11318]Superb ENB-RL[/url];
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox[/url];
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971] Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents by pikkatze[/url] - male eyebrows on screen-shots (darker version);
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url] - male body nude replacer Sundracon Meshes;
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145]Smooth male body normal map[/url]-custom normal map for Sundracon Body, edited by me.

[b]If you enjoy this mod in game and you have some nice screen-shots, you are welcome to share them here in the image section, just keep it SFW please. This is a simple facedesign mod and I want to keep it from getting flagged as adult. If you want to demonstrate some naughty bits - post those screen shots in the BB Luxury Suite's image upload section, where the adult flag is set.[/b]

[size=+1][b]Thanks and credits:[/b][/size]

- First of all HUGE thanks to my friend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3325399/?]migal130[/url], without whom none of my mods would ever come to existence, for all his help and expertise and all his in-depth explanations, and for his great [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11427]Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite[/url]
- Many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii[/url] for the beautiful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] and for all her help and useful advices.
- Many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3343364]brideofmigal[/url] for creating the original male characters for the Beefcake version of BBLS.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/39591]yapi75[/url] for the help and inspiration.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4050102]RIP88[/url] for his perfect [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19866]Classier BB Luxury Suite[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3287988]TheFigment[/url] for useful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5064]TESVSnip[/url]
- Many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/328241]Pikkatze[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/30377]Geonox[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/114172]Chris57[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/115378]Madcat221[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1106672]FavoredSoul[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1630086]Sundracon[/url] for the textures and meshes that make a mod like this worthwhile.
- And last but not least many thanks to the Nexus Network, for providing and maintaining such a great place for modders to share their work.
